skill.name: project-planning
skill.description: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept description. Use when starting a new project, when docs/planning/ contains placeholder files, or when user requests project planning document generation.
skill.summary: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept de...
skill.author: ByronWilliamsCPA

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation and planning skill. The Python validation script only reads/writes project planning documents in the docs/planning/ directory. No network calls, no credential access, no file system escalation beyond project documentation.

content.value_statement: Starting a new project without clear planning leads to architectural drift and context loss. This skill generates four essential planning documents (Project Vision, Architecture Decisions, Technical Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept to maintain coherence across AI-assisted development sessions.
actual_capabilities: Generate Project Vision & Scope document from a project concept
Create Architecture Decision Records with templates and rationale
Write Technical Implementation Specifications with tech stack details
Build Development Roadmaps with phased milestones and tasks
Validate planning documents for completeness and cross-references
Synthesize all documents into a comprehensive PROJECT-PLAN.md
limitations: Does not execute code or modify source files directly
Does not integrate with external project management tools
Does not generate implementation code or tests
Requires manual review and validation of generated documents

use_cases.title: Start New Projects Right
use_cases.description: Generate complete planning documentation before writing any code to establish clear architectural direction.

use_cases.title: Maintain Context Coherence
use_cases.description: Create reference documents that prevent context loss and architectural drift across coding sessions.

use_cases.title: Document Key Decisions
use_cases.description: Record architectural decisions with alternatives considered and rationale for future team reference.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Project Planning
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants planning documents for a new project
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate project planning documents for my [project type] project that will [main purpose]. Focus on [specific requirements].

prompt_templates.title: Full Planning Suite
prompt_templates.scenario: Complete planning with all four documents
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the /plan skill to generate a complete planning suite: Project Vision & Scope, ADRs for database and auth, Technical Spec, and Development Roadmap. My project is [description].

prompt_templates.title: Synthesize Existing Docs
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the synthesize workflow to create PROJECT-PLAN.md from my existing planning documents. Map phases to git branch names.

prompt_templates.title: Expert Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the generated [PVS/Tech Spec/Roadmap] against quality standards: check for specificity, no placeholders, measurable criteria, and cross-references to other documents.

output_examples.input: Plan a CLI tool for tracking personal finance transactions
output: Generated docs/planning/project-vision.md - Problem statement, users, scope boundaries
Generated docs/planning/tech-spec.md - Python/Click architecture, data model
Validation passed: No placeholders, all cross-references valid

best_practices: Review each generated document before proceeding to ensure accuracy
Validate assumptions marked with checkboxes before implementation
Keep planning documents updated as the project evolves
Use ADR templates for any significant architectural decision during development
anti_patterns: Skipping planning and starting implementation immediately
Leaving placeholder text like [TODO] or [TBD] in final documents
Generating all documents without reviewing them sequentially
Failing to update documents when architectural decisions change

faq.question: What AI tools is this compatible with?
faq.answer: Works with Claude and Claude Code. The skill uses Claude-specific commands like /plan and /synthesize.

faq.question: How long does document generation take?
faq.answer: Generating all four documents with expert review takes 5-10 minutes. Document validation is instant.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes. Edit templates in templates/ directory to match your project standards or organizational requirements.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All documents are generated locally in your project directory. No data is sent to external services.

faq.question: What if validation fails?
faq.answer: Fix the reported issues: add missing sections, remove placeholders, or create missing cross-referenced documents.

faq.question: How is this different from general project management tools?
faq.answer: This skill is purpose-built for AI-assisted development, providing AI-specific prompting patterns and context loading strategies.
